text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zai-org/Open-AutoGLM | 96% | stars now 17845 → est 33523 (range 33432-33614)
   https://github.com/zai-org/Open-AutoGLM
2) productdevbook/port-killer | 94% | stars now 1968 → est 7702 (range 7677-7727)
   https://github.com/productdevbook/port-killer
3) apple/ml-sharp | 94% | stars now 3180 → est 7395 (range 7370-7420)
   https://github.com/apple/ml-sharp
4) HKUDS/Paper2Slides | 91% | stars now 2337 → est 4162 (range 4137-4187)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/Paper2Slides
5) eooce/Gla-deploy | 91% | stars now 1149 → est 2997 (range 2972-3022)
   https://github.com/eooce/Gla-deploy

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
